alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 17 at 7:23PM CDT until July 18 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR STRONG WEST WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FWZ 417...418...419...434 AND 435 MONDAY... ...A FIRE WEATHER WATCH FWZS 430...431...432...433...436 AND 437 FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY MONDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY FOR STRONG WEST WINDS...LOW HUMIDITY AND ISOLATED DRY THUNDERSTORMS... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WIND...West to west-southwest winds 15 to 25 mph sustained with possible gusts to 35 to 45 mph by late afternoon and early evening. * HUMIDITY...Afternoon humidity 9 to 15 percent. * HAINES...5 to 6 or Moderate to High potential for rapid fire growth. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated dry thunderstorms are possible Monday afternoon and early evening. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest
